Text: Tell me please dicret if not working since have only XP2 please.
This works with Vista and 7. Probably made by Hazar, all the previous ones have worked. Emulates OEM activation. Have used it on 7 Ult x64 and 7 Home Premium x32.

Seems to work just fine on Windows 7 pre activated. I needed this because the virtual machine I installed it in emulates old hardware. It has no bios slic available to complete the activation. Thanks for this patch!
This patch should be installed before or after win 7 installation?
Works Flawlesley thankyou. For others please note, just use the default settings that the programme sets and it will work!
